net.java.jddac.jmdi.service
Interface CommListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicNCAPBlock, LocalSubscriberPort, MessageQueueBlock, Reporter
public interface CommListener

The listener interface for receiving messages delivered via the communications fabric.

See Also:
CommFabric

Method Detail

messageReceived

boolean messageReceived(int mlId,
                        ArgArray msg)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Invoked when message received for this listener.

Parameters:
mlId - id from addCommListener call
msg - messsage
Returns:
true if message delivered, false if should be processed by other listeners
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
